creditline: Gift of the John C. Weber Collection
description: large plate, with large, green pointed leaves, with purple and blue sprigs extending out of sides of leaves; yellow background with tiny black spots; purple border, with alternating decorative sections that consist of a purple flower with blue decorative lines extending outward, and a diamond pattern with crosses inside, with a blue plume overlapping in C, each in cased in green, decorative borders
medium: Porcelain with green, yellow, aubergine and blue overglaze
title: Large Dish with Paulownia-Leaf Design
